record.description: Builds and deploys a single-page React application using S3 and (if specified) Route53

domain.description: The domain (e.g. example.com, www.xbf.example.com) that this record is routing from

record_type.description: The type of Route53 record to deploy

identifier.description: Only pass this if you have multiple record sets that point to the same location and have the same type. If that is true, this value must be unique for each of those records

weight.description: Only necessary for record sets with a weighted routing policy. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/DeveloperGuide/routing-policy.html#routing-policy-weighted for details

region.description: Only used for latency-based record sets. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/DeveloperGuide/routing-policy.html#routing-policy-latency for details

continent.description: Use to route all queries from a continent to a particular endpoint

country.description: Use to route all queries from a country to a particular endpoint

state.description: Used to route traffic on a US state-by-state basis. If using this parameter, country will be automatically set to "US"

failover.description: Used to route calls to a secondary endpoint if the primary endpoint fails its health check. Both records must have failover present

ttl.description: The resource record cache time to live, in seconds. Not useable with Alias records (type 'A')

Value.description: The current or new DNS record value. Current in the case of a DELETE op.

alias_target_type.description: The type of service that this alias record is targeting

target_s3_region.description: The region that the static website bucket was created in. Defaults to the region the lambda is deployed in

target_s3_bucket.description: The name of both the bucket to point to and the domain. Used to let the extension know to point to S3

target_cloudfront_domain_name.description: The domain name Cloudfront assigned when you created the distribution that this record is going to point to

target_api_hosted_zone_id.description: The hosted zone ID for the API this record is pointing to

target_api_domain_name.description: The domain name for the API this record is pointing to

evaluate_target_health.description: When set to true, this alias record set inherits the health of the referenced AWS resource

domain.description: The full domain for the record

hosted_zone_id.description: The ID of the hosted zone that this record lies in
